title: Fern bank salamander
text:
The fern bank salamander ("Eurycea pterophila"), also known as the Blanco River Springs salamander, is a species of <a href="salamander">salamander</a> in the family <a href="Plethodontidae">Plethodontidae</a>.
It is <a href="endemic">endemic</a> to springs in the <a href="Blanco%20River%20%28Texas%29">Blanco River</a> watershed in central <a href="Texas">Texas</a>, United States.
Its natural <a href="habitat">habitat</a> is freshwater <a href="Spring%20%28hydrosphere%29">spring</a>s.
